attributes.action: Allow people with coeliac to join the RAF
attributes.additional_details: The RAF currently accommodate vegetarians, halal and kosher and not coeliac. This is clearly discrimination that needs to be removed from the forces in the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Pass a legal bill that allows people with coeliac to join the RAF, and not be discriminated against because of this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Allow Coeliacs to serve in the Royal Navy and other British Armed Force Branches:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590810
